Using this one for cleaning the gums and teeth. Good one. Prescription by the dentist.

Product is OK..but I don't think it can be easily used at home..the water force is too high, and there is a possibility that we can hurt our gums or tongue if the water direction changes even a little.. even with the soft mode, it isn't like massaging the gums and I feel it painful.. giving 5 stars for warranty registration.. probably others too would have done the same..

Maybe it’s just me but this Flosser works only if I hold it absolutely vertically. If I tilt/lean it it starts “gasping” and sucking air. I know there is a pipe that has to be in water to work. Even tjen it’s not working properly.

There is hardly any difference between the 4 modes. Most importantly,  the power generated by the unit is pathetic inspite of increasing through the mode button. It is as good as rinsing the mouth as normally done. My suggestion is the power has to be increased multifold like Dr.Trust or Oracura brands. Mine, though purchased 2 weeks ago is lying waste. I bought Orcura OC 300 LITE afew days ago and it is doing its job satisfactorily. I am unable to return your product as the return by date is passed. Sorry as I am disappointed with your product.

The flosser stopped working in 4 months. Doesn't power on or get charged. Agreed to replace it since it's during warranty period. However it's been 8 days since they agreed to replace and have not received the replacement product. Since I can't stop flossing for weeks together while waiting for a replacement ended up purchasing a new one. Don't see a reason to buy this especially when there are flossers with larger water capacity and usb-c charging available at lower prices.

Hi all,I have purchased Agaro water flosser from Amazon around June this year, need of the hour of you have dental problems, battery lasts almost a week, only drawback i think so is the capacity as we need to at least four times water filling to do the flossing.Update:Recently there was a problem with my flosser, contacted customer care regarding it. Even after 4 weeks they are saying they will get back but none came. Kindly check before buying . Note: its under warranty period.
Does not work to expected level. Not recommended to buy

Product is good but stopped working and even after multiple calls to customer service the issue remains unresolved for over 15 days. No wonder people prefer good legacy brands over such new age brands. Waste of money.
I really regret buying this since it's not returnable. The water pressure is so extreme, even at the soft or normal setting that it made my gums bleed.Please don't waste your money.

They don't sell the adaptor.  I used mobile charge adaptor.  It was fine.  Now it's not charging.  They don't sell the charging cable separately either.  I am not sure if the issue is with the cable or adaptor compatibility or the flosser itself.  The other charging cable costs as much as the flosser itself.  It didn't even work for 3 months.  Waste of money.
Water pressure is too high on soft mode also. Blood started comming from gums in first time use.
